name: test_NAF_3_5_0_add_kids
description:
Test Case: NAF-42
    As a registered user I can add my kids info in my profile page
    Scenario: Add Kids
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Add a child" button
    4. Enter child's name
    5. Enter child's age
    6. Click on "Save" button
    7. Verify child's info is added
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-42
As a registered user I can add my kids info in my profile page
Scenario: Add Kids

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to "My Profile" button
3. Click on "Add a child" button
4. Enter child's name
5. Enter child's age
6. Click on "Save" button
7. Verify child's info is added

self = <test_3_Account_Setup.TestPersonInformationManagement object at 0x107923350>
setup_and_teardown = <appium.webdriver.webdriver.WebDriver (session="5d7b429b-28d6-4fcc-bc3c-9f179d3c6b24")>

    @allure.story("3.5.0 As a registered user I can add my kids info in my profile page")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.BLOCKER)
    @allure.description("""
    Test Case: NAF-42
    As a registered user I can add my kids info in my profile page
    Scenario: Add Kids
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Add a child" button
    4. Enter child's name
    5. Enter child's age
    6. Click on "Save" button
    7. Verify child's info is added
    """)
    def test_NAF_3_5_0_add_kids(self, setup_and_teardown):
        driver = setup_and_teardown
    
        perinfo_page = PersonInfoPage(driver)
        sleep(1)
        perinfo_page.click_user_profile()
        logger.info("Enter user profile")
        perinfo_page.error_getting_offers_tip()
    
    
        perinfo_page.click_add_kids_btn()
>       perinfo_page.send_kids_name()

name = 'auto-add kid'

    def send_kids_name(self, name='auto-add kid'):
        try:
    
            self.find_element(*self.KIDS_NAME_INPUT_LOCATOR).clear()
            logger.info("Clear the old name success")
            self.send_keys_to_element(*self.KIDS_NAME_INPUT_LOCATOR, name)
            logger.info(f"Entered name: {name}")
